game_formats.name: Battle of Yavin
game_formats.description: Relive the Rebellion's attack on the Death Star from Star Wars: A New Hope.

game_formats.name: Epic
game_formats.description: Expand the scope of your X-Wing games! The epic mode broadens the possibilities with entire wings of starfighters working as one while fighting alongside-and against-huge ships like the iconic CR90 Corvette.

game_formats.name: Evacuation of D’qar
game_formats.description: The First Order has discovered the Resistance base on D’qar. Relive the high-stakes battle as the Resistance makes their escape!

game_formats.name: Hyperspace
game_formats.description:
The Second Edition game mode is an ideal introduction for players new to X-Wing.

This game mode includes only those components found in the second edition Core Set and ship expansions. Choose a faction, then select up to 200 points of pilots and upgrades to create your squad.

game_formats.name: No Glory
game_formats.description: These pilots, who shall remain nameless, fly with a steadfast commitment to their faction.

game_formats.name: Playing Favorites
game_formats.description: Just one pilot for each ship is available, with a wide array of upgrades to complement them.
